media:group.media:title: 8 language learning routine | (EP 1 German)
media:group.media:description:
Hey guys, this is are my different routines for studying 8 LANGUAGES 💖 🦜 TOUCAN (free chrome extension): https://jointoucan.com/partners/languagegirl 📸 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/karen.loves.languages/ 0:00 - 0:57 - Intro 0:58 - 3:13 Free extension 3:14 - 3:59 My German after 3 years 4:00 - 6:46 Vocab acquisition 6:47- 7:45 Grammar TIP 1 7: 46 - 9:05 Mistake sheet 9:06 - 10:09 Diary 10:10 -11:02 outro
YOU CAN FIND ME @: 📸 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/karen.loves.languages/
